text: Jay Arthur Pritzker (August 26, 1922 â€“ January 23, 1999) was an American entrepreneur, conglomerate organizer, and member of the Pritzker family.The Economist: "Jay Pritzker, pioneer of the modern hotel chain, died on January 23rd, aged 76" January 28, 1999 He was the co-founder of Hyatt Corporation. The Jay Pritzker Pavilion is named after him. ==References== ==Other websites== *Jay Pritzker Pavilion @ Millennium Park, Chicago Category:1922 births Category:1999 deaths Category:American economists Category:Businesspeople from Chicago
title: Jay Pritzker
